p: Nevertheless, a considerable proportion of M. gallisepticum strains can produce biofilms, the most potent of which is the Nobilis MG 6/85 strain [ 181]. Intriguingly, the Nobilis MG 6/85 is an attenuated vaccine strain and its biofilm formation is not necessarily associated with pathogenicity. Otherwise, all M. gallisepticum strains from house finches produce biofilms, but no difference was observed in the biofilm density between these strains [ 165], which implies that the formation of biofilms was independent of the house finch conjunctivitis caused by M. gallisepticum.
